cause.description:
Everyone knows that the letter "c" just blatantly steals it's sound from either the letter K or S. I know a lot of people might say, but we need the letter c for "ch", but my idea is to give that to the letter K.
Chris- Kris switch- switkh(under new rule) candle- kandle ceremony- seremony couch-koukh (also under new rule) ceiling- seiling
1. It steals it's sound from the letter K.
2. It steals it's sound from the letter S
cause.mission: Remove the letter "C" from the Alphabet
cause.name: See no more C's
